tool_description: Access thousands of funny Chuck Norris Jokes! See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/worldtime
name: Chuck Norris by API-Ninjas
title: Chuck Norris by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/chucknorris
api_list.description: API Ninjas Chuck Norris API endpoint. Returns a Chuck Norris joke.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chuck-norris-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com/v1/chucknorris"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chuck-norris-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
